properties.name: supmap.properties.database-name
properties.description: The name of the MongoDB database used by the notification service to store alert and notification data.

properties.name: supmap.properties.elasticsearch-password
properties.description: Password for authenticating with the Elasticsearch instance used for indexing and searching notification data.

properties.name: supmap.properties.elasticsearch-url
properties.description: URL endpoint for the Elasticsearch service used for efficient querying of notification history and analytics.

properties.name: supmap.properties.elasticsearch-username
properties.description: Username for authenticating with the Elasticsearch instance used for notification data indexing.

properties.name: supmap.properties.kafka-bootstrap-servers
properties.description: Comma-separated list of host:port pairs for establishing the initial connection to the Kafka cluster for event processing.

properties.name: supmap.properties.mongo-uri
properties.description: Connection string URI for the MongoDB database, including authentication credentials if required.
